questions: A pond contains clean water. Which of the following activities will produce the least pollution of water?

questions: Many man-made projects use non-renewable resources such as oil or petroleum. Which of the following is a way to conserve non-renewable resources?

questions: Karnataka Government had launched Project Elephant to save Asian elephants in the state. Which amongst the following statements reflect the purpose of the project.

option2: Creating conservation awareness among local people
option3: Providing improved veterinary care for captive elephants

questions: What does Carbon monoxide in vehicle exhaust causes?
